Build ID: 20110707182747

Steps to reproduce:

Press spacebar one or more times on a long page (taller than the viewport) to scroll down.


Actual results:

Nothing until I jiggle the mouse.


Expected results:

Scrolling down without having to generate a mouse event.

It happened at

http://www.randsinrepose.com/archives/2011/07/29/the_desktop_transition.html

just now. You might have to experiment with alt-tabbing to other windows, etc, to make it happen. I haven't been able to reproduce the bug reliably.

Don't know about safe mode behaviour; I will see about trying that, although it seems it would be hard to confirm that an intermittent bug is absent.
